creator: mchassagneux@apache.org

text: Changing the behaviour of this to return the actual contents of the file breaks some tests - I've "fixed" them but please check to see if this is actually valid for the application as I don't have a good way to test JMS stuff. See: https://github.com/apache/jmeter/pull/346
creator: graham@ham1.co.uk
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
